title: Why Customers Choose Us
paragraphs: Is a leading system integrator and sole distributor of electronic and electrical components targeted for the markets of industrial automation, building automation and energy saving solutions all over India.
Since our inception in 1990, we have amassed unrivalled experience and knowledge. You can be confident that product support, service, and inventory are just a phone call or email away.

Leelavati Automation Pvt. Ltd. has established, documented, implemented, and maintained a quality management system to ensure that the products and services it provides conform to specified customer requirements, as well as to provide opportunities for continuous improvement in overall quality in accordance with ISO 9001:2015 International Standard requirements.
paragraphs1: We are well-known for our excellent customer service, on-time delivery, and consistent quality material. We are rapidly expanding and are now looking to expand into other countries. Our product line reflects the cutting edge of high technology. We are constantly aware of market conditions and strive to provide the most recent products.
